about_the_game:
THE HEART OF THE FOREST BECKONS...

Peachleaf Valley: Eden's Story is the second DLC content release for "Peachleaf Valley: Seeds of Love" featuring Eden, Spirit of The Land as a new romanceable bachelor!

Step into an enchanting world where nature’s secrets unfold, and follow Eden’s Story—a journey woven with fairies, folklore, and the hidden magic of Peachleaf Valley. As the Lord of The Land, Eden embodies an ethereal, almost dreamlike presence that draws you into a romance unlike any other. 🌸✨

Explore themes of destiny, connection to nature, and timeless love as you unravel Eden’s role in the valley and his hidden ties to its ancient legends. With Eden, every choice leads deeper into the heart of a fantasy story filled with flowers, whispers, and wonder. 🍃🌼

  • Interactive Romance – Delve into moments of wonder and enchantment with exclusive interactions and choices that deepen your connection to Eden and the spirit world.

  • Captivating (Optional) Animations – Enjoy stunning animations that bring Eden’s magic to life, all customizable to create the experience that feels right for you. With our customizable accessibility menu, you can tailor animations to suit your preferences, ensuring an experience as immersive—or streamlined—as you’d like. Craft your ideal playthrough and enjoy Peachleaf Valley your way!

  • Beautiful Background Illustrations – Discover breathtaking backgrounds showcasing the hidden, mystical side of Peachleaf Valley, from flower-laden groves to moonlit glades.

  • Spellbinding CG Moments – Collect CGs that capture Eden’s most magical moments, filled with romance and a hint of mystery.

  • Partial Voice Acting – Listen to Eden, and the cast come to life through performances by professional voice actors that add an enchanting depth to each scene.

  • New Music Tracks – Enjoy exclusive tracks inspired by the beauty of nature and the world of fairies, designed to immerse you in Eden’s story.

  • AND Exclusive New Characters and Locations to explore in the Valley!

fullgame.name: Peachleaf Valley: Seeds of Love - a farming inspired otome

name: Peachleaf Valley: Eden's Story (DLC)
short_description: Peachleaf Valley: Eden's Story is the second DLC for Peachleaf Valley featuring Eden, Spirit of The Land! It features the story and ability to romance Eden, The Lord of The Land, whose destiny is interwoven with fairies, folklore, and the hidden magic of Peachleaf Valley.🍃🌼
